name: react-native-matomo-sdk
description: React Native wrapper for iOS and Android Matomo SDKs

scripts.test:js: cd example/ && npm ci && npm run test:js
scripts.test:android: cd example/ && npm ci && npm run test:android
scripts.test:ios: cd example/ && npm ci && npm run test:ios
